title: Tim Walz's first reaction to election loss; tears and hand over heart as Harris speaks
content: More embarrassing defeat for Tim Walz came today as Donald Trump won in Minnesota county where Tim Walz started his political career. The overall presidential vote in Minnesota, however, went to Harris and Walz. As Harris spoke yesterday at Howard, Tim Walz was seen crying. Kamala Harris step-daughter Ella Emhoff was also seen breaking down.
summary: More embarrassing defeat for Tim Walz came today as Donald Trump won in Minnesota county where Tim Walz started his political career. The overall presidential vote in Minnesota, however, went to Harris and Walz. As Harris spoke yesterday at Howard, Tim Walz was seen crying. Kamala Harris step-daughter Ella Emhoff was also seen breaking down.

title: When Donald Trump said he wouldn't protect Prince Harry; Meghan Markle's 'divisive' jibe
content: Harry and Meghan have a plan B as well -- though it's not certain what they had in mind before they purchased a new house in Portugal -- to flee the US or to flex their defiance near home (UK). According to the experts, Meghan will never shift her base to anywhere else as she has big Hollywood dreams which she is still pursuing despite losing her popularity every day.
summary: Harry and Meghan have a plan B as well -- though it's not certain what they had in mind before they purchased a new house in Portugal -- to flee the US or to flex their defiance near home (UK). According to the experts, Meghan will never shift her base to anywhere else as she has big Hollywood dreams which she is still pursuing despite losing her popularity every day.

title: Did Donald Trump Jr say his father's cabinet won't have people smarter than the President?
content: Don Jr is part of the transition team as Donald Trump is now preparing for his second term in the White House. Some obvious names are Tesla CEO Elon Musk for department of government efficiency which will be set up as Musk himself claimed many times and Trump promised the Musk would be part of the administration. Another key player is RFK Jr who quit his independent presidential race and endorsed Donald Trump. Trump hinted that RFK Jr, a health crusader, will be given health and environment-related roles. And then there is Tulsi Gabbard.
summary: Don Jr is part of the transition team as Donald Trump is now preparing for his second term in the White House. Some obvious names are Tesla CEO Elon Musk for department of government efficiency which will be set up as Musk himself claimed many times and Trump promised the Musk would be part of the administration. Another key player is RFK Jr who quit his independent presidential race and endorsed Donald Trump. Trump hinted that RFK Jr, a health crusader, will be given health and environment-related roles. And then there is Tulsi Gabbard.

title: Watch: Morning Joe host shocked to learn butter price. 'Is it framed in gold?'
content: “Butter is $7… What, is it framed in gold?” Scarborough was shocked. “If you look at the cost of groceries, if you look at the cost of gas, if you look at the cost of things compared to four years ago it was a very simple answer for working-class Americans. Things didn't cost so much,” the former Republican said.
summary: “Butter is $7… What, is it framed in gold?” Scarborough was shocked. “If you look at the cost of groceries, if you look at the cost of gas, if you look at the cost of things compared to four years ago it was a very simple answer for working-class Americans. Things didn't cost so much,” the former Republican said.

title: 'Voted for Donald Trump but not Kari Lake': Arizona election latest updates
content: 55-year-old Kari Lake is a former Fox 10 news anchor and journalist who lost the 2022 governor's race and called it an election fraud. Lake quit journalism to enter politics and became a MAGA spokesperson. During Covid, she led anti-mask rallies and said as governor she would not tolerate mask and vaccine mandates.
summary: 55-year-old Kari Lake is a former Fox 10 news anchor and journalist who lost the 2022 governor's race and called it an election fraud. Lake quit journalism to enter politics and became a MAGA spokesperson. During Covid, she led anti-mask rallies and said as governor she would not tolerate mask and vaccine mandates.

title: Watch: Jimmy Kimmel tears up speaking about 'terrible' election night
content: Jimmy Kimmel said it was a bad night for those who voted for Donald Trump; just that they didn't understand it. It was a 'disaster of a night' for Melania, Kimmel said. It was only a good night for Putin, polio and lovable billionaires like Elon Musk, Kimmel said. "I will say something that Trump would never say unless it favoured him.... He won. That doesn't mean we give up and that doesn't mean we storm the Capitol because we don't like the result," Kimmel said.
summary: Jimmy Kimmel said it was a bad night for those who voted for Donald Trump; just that they didn't understand it. It was a 'disaster of a night' for Melania, Kimmel said. It was only a good night for Putin, polio and lovable billionaires like Elon Musk, Kimmel said. "I will say something that Trump would never say unless it favoured him.... He won. That doesn't mean we give up and that doesn't mean we storm the Capitol because we don't like the result," Kimmel said.

title: 'Nostradamus' Allan Licthman blames democracy after failure to predict Trump win
content: For over four decades, Lichtman has used his "Keys to the White House" model with striking accuracy, having correctly predicted every presidential winner since 1984. The 77-year-old American University professor believed that Harris would emerge victorious in the 2024 election, convinced by the model's indicators that pointed towards a Democratic win. However, as the results confirmed Trump’s landslide victory, Lichtman found himself caught off-guard, live-streaming his disbelief alongside his son, Sam. The political soothsayer was left pondering what went awry, even joking, “Good thing I’ve nothing on tomorrow. No interviews for me.”
summary: For over four decades, Lichtman has used his "Keys to the White House" model with striking accuracy, having correctly predicted every presidential winner since 1984. The 77-year-old American University professor believed that Harris would emerge victorious in the 2024 election, convinced by the model's indicators that pointed towards a Democratic win. However, as the results confirmed Trump’s landslide victory, Lichtman found himself caught off-guard, live-streaming his disbelief alongside his son, Sam. The political soothsayer was left pondering what went awry, even joking, “Good thing I’ve nothing on tomorrow. No interviews for me.”

title: Elon Musk and son X are part of Donald Trump's family photo. Where's Melania?
content: ​Elon Musk and his son featuring in the Trump squad seemed interesting to social media users as they observed that it was not a campaign photo -- JD Vance and Usha were not there. Melania was also not there but Elon and his son were there. Elon Musk is not very public about his children but X is an exception as he made several public appearances with X whose full name is X Æ A-Xii. At the Madison Square Garden rally too, X was there with his father.
summary: ​Elon Musk and his son featuring in the Trump squad seemed interesting to social media users as they observed that it was not a campaign photo -- JD Vance and Usha were not there. Melania was also not there but Elon and his son were there. Elon Musk is not very public about his children but X is an exception as he made several public appearances with X whose full name is X Æ A-Xii. At the Madison Square Garden rally too, X was there with his father.

title: America Ferrera is devastated that Kamala Harris lost, will leave US
content: "America (Ferrera) is sick that Donald Trump is President again. She is devastated that Kamala lost. She thought the country she lived in was better than that," the report said. "She is going to continue to have a presence in the US for work purposes and to fight for Latinas and women, but she will be overseas for family and to benefit her kids' education," it said.
summary: "America (Ferrera) is sick that Donald Trump is President again. She is devastated that Kamala lost. She thought the country she lived in was better than that," the report said. "She is going to continue to have a presence in the US for work purposes and to fight for Latinas and women, but she will be overseas for family and to benefit her kids' education," it said.

title: 'Call Barron': Donald Trump's instruction to staff before approving podcast list
content: ​Barron Trump's height is not the only talked about aspect of Donald Trump's youngest son this election season. The 18-year-old became the DeFi visionary of Donald Trump's crypto platform World Liberty Financial during the election campaign. And Trump spoke profusely about how handy Barron came to reach out to the Gen Z audience as Barron is well versed in podcasts and knew which could bring Trump the maximum coverage.

title: Elon Musk's estranged daughter says she has no future in Trump's US: 'Even if...'
content: "I've thought this for a while, but yesterday confirmed it for me. I don't see my future being in the United States. Even if he's only in office for 4 years, even if the anti-trans regulations magically don't happen, the people who willingly voted this in are not going anywhere anytime soon," Elon Musk's estranged daughter Vivian Jenna Wilson posted on Threads.
summary: "I've thought this for a while, but yesterday confirmed it for me. I don't see my future being in the United States. Even if he's only in office for 4 years, even if the anti-trans regulations magically don't happen, the people who willingly voted this in are not going anywhere anytime soon," Elon Musk's estranged daughter Vivian Jenna Wilson posted on Threads.

title: Diddy's son takes over his Instagram, social media says 'horrible PR'
content: Despite the criticism, Diddy’s children have shown steadfast support for him. His adoptive son, Quincy Brown, posted a family photo on Instagram on October 22, 2024, highlighting their unity and belief that the truth would prevail. His caption emphasized their strength as a family during these difficult times.
summary: Despite the criticism, Diddy’s children have shown steadfast support for him. His adoptive son, Quincy Brown, posted a family photo on Instagram on October 22, 2024, highlighting their unity and belief that the truth would prevail. His caption emphasized their strength as a family during these difficult times.

title: 'None of them dare name Khalistanis': PPC's Bernier slams Trudeau for silence over temple attack
content: Canada's right-wing leaders, inspired by recent Republican victories in the US, are challenging Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's policies. Maxime Bernier, leader of the People's Party of Canada, criticizes Trudeau's stance on immigration, climate change, and government spending, urging for a more conservative approach.
summary: Canada's right-wing leaders, inspired by recent Republican victories in the US, are challenging Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's policies. Maxime Bernier, leader of the People's Party of Canada, criticizes Trudeau's stance on immigration, climate change, and government spending, urging for a more conservative approach.

title: Indonesia's Mount Laki-laki erupts again, spewing ash 8,000 meters high
US judge upholds plea deals for alleged 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed
‘He was too strong’: Passenger attempts to open plane’s emergency door mid-air, see video
content: A Copa Airlines flight from Brazil to Panama experienced a harrowing near-disaster when a passenger, armed with a plastic knife, attempted to open the emergency door. Passengers bravely intervened, subduing the man until authorities apprehended him upon landing. The airline commended both the crew and passengers for their quick action in ensuring the safety of everyone on board.
summary: A Copa Airlines flight from Brazil to Panama experienced a harrowing near-disaster when a passenger, armed with a plastic knife, attempted to open the emergency door. Passengers bravely intervened, subduing the man until authorities apprehended him upon landing. The airline commended both the crew and passengers for their quick action in ensuring the safety of everyone on board.

title: Hurricane Rafael makes landfall in Cuba as a 'life-threatening' category 3 storm
Democrats blame Joe Biden for Kamala Harris’ massive defeat in US elections
content: Kamala Harris lost the US election to Donald Trump, marking the second time Democrats lost to him. Biden's late withdrawal from the race due to health concerns and Harris's alignment with his policies are cited as contributing factors to the loss. The Democrats now face calls for introspection and change within the party.
summary: Kamala Harris lost the US election to Donald Trump, marking the second time Democrats lost to him. Biden's late withdrawal from the race due to health concerns and Harris's alignment with his policies are cited as contributing factors to the loss. The Democrats now face calls for introspection and change within the party.

title: Sundar Pichai to Satya Nadella: How prominent Indian-Americans reacted to Trump’s win
content: Several prominent Indian-Americans congratulated Donald Trump on his re-election as US President. They expressed their eagerness to collaborate with his administration in strengthening US-India relations and advancing shared global interests. Figures like Vivek Ramaswamy, Sunder Pichai, and Satya Nadella were among those who publicly conveyed their well-wishes and support.
summary: Several prominent Indian-Americans congratulated Donald Trump on his re-election as US President. They expressed their eagerness to collaborate with his administration in strengthening US-India relations and advancing shared global interests. Figures like Vivek Ramaswamy, Sunder Pichai, and Satya Nadella were among those who publicly conveyed their well-wishes and support.

title: Trump Media gains post-election, even as Truth Social parent reports $19 million quarterly loss
content: Trump Media, the parent company of Truth Social, reported a loss of USD 19.2 million in the last quarter. The company attributed the loss to legal fees and declining revenue. Despite the financial struggles, the company's stock price surged following Trump's presidential win.
summary: Trump Media, the parent company of Truth Social, reported a loss of USD 19.2 million in the last quarter. The company attributed the loss to legal fees and declining revenue. Despite the financial struggles, the company's stock price surged following Trump's presidential win.
